channel.title: How do you make NPC to say words?
channel.description: how you make an npc to say welcome to [servername] how you do that?

item.title: How do you make NPC to say words?
item.dc:creator: @hmong95 hmong95
item.description:
@hmong95 wrote:

[quote=“Deathspirit, post:2, topic:310554”]declare this in your NPChandler.java

if (npcs[i].npcType == YOUR NPC ID HERE) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "YOUR TEXT HERE"; } }
And change the things wich i said, Also next time post this in the good section.[/quote]
Thank very much

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make NPC to say words?

item.title: How do you make NPC to say words?
item.dc:creator: @Deathspirit Deathspirit
item.description:
@Deathspirit wrote:

declare this in your NPChandler.java

if (npcs[i].npcType == YOUR NPC ID HERE) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "YOUR TEXT HERE"; } }
And change the things wich i said, Also next time post this in the good section.
